snippet: A federal appeals court on Friday upheld Gov. Scott Walker’s law stripping most public workers of most of their collective bargaining rights.
abstract: Federal appeals court upholds Wisconsin Gov Scott Walker’s law stripping most public workers of most of their collective bargaining rights.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court on Friday upheld Gov. Scott Walker’s law stripping most public workers of most of their collective bargaining rights.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Governor Wins a Round in Fight Over Union Bargaining Rights
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Governor Wins a Round In Fight Over Union Bargaining Rights
